评论概述: Returned only for a hole in the leg seam.
评论详情: I love these type of pants. You can make them look more dressy or more casual. They fit true to size. They’re stretchy and I have multiple pairs of this brand and the crz something brand that have similar pants. I only returned the last pair because they had a huge hole in the seam on the thigh when I got them. Definitely get a black and navy pair! They go with everything! I’ve worn them with hey dudes and a nice shirt and looked business casual. I’ve also worn them with a sweatshirt and was comfy both ways!

I was expecting these pants to be good, but not this good! So soft, thick waistband doesn’t roll, it at the perfect point on leg, lightweight, but not so much that they crumple, and frankly an absolute bargain compared to other pants out there. They hit just the tiniest bit above my natural waist. So nice to find a pair of pants like this that doesn’t come up to my rib cage!  They are definitely casual, so I might describe with the reviews that say you can dress them up or down, but definitely a less casual alternative to sweatpants. Will probably buy in other colors!

I am 165 lbs @ 5'3", measuring 36DD-32-42, and I wear a sz 12 in AE jeans. I bought these pants in a sz XL in Navy. These pants are extremely flattering, fit perfectly around the waist with a real draw string, nice pockets, and a perfect length for me at a half inch from the floor at my heel. The fit even disguises my small belly pooch. The material is soft and cool to the touch, a polyester I'm sure, thin but sturdy, and dark blue. Something that I'm disappointed in is that the hem of my boyshort underwear shows through the pants. I wanted to be able to wear these for quick errands, and not have to worry about vpl. Also, the description says these are sweatpants, but they are not what I would describe as sweats. They are a material similar to track or yoga pants.

These are the most comfortable and well made pants ever!  The stretch is awesome, and fabric is warm (better than sweats).  I ordered 4 pair!  XXL fit great(I am a size 20) ! They are not ankle pants though, I am 5’2 and my inseam is 26 inches.  These were much too long.  Maybe offer petite lengths? Please!
These pants are very comfortable and fit well. But there are darker color lines in the fabric. And color is not true to picture. Had a more golden yellow color.

I have wide hips, I normally wear an XL but after reading reviews I decided to get xxl and they fit perfect. 5’6”, 205 lbs, pear shaped body. Large booty. Hard to find workout pants that fit me. Leggings look silly with my thunder thighs lol. These are more fitted on me than other joggers but loose enough to not be leggings. Comfortable and very breathable. Some of the tech fabrics trap moisture or are itchy, these feel cool on the skin and I can feel air movement! I will prob order a few different colors! I think these will not only be great work hot pants, but could just be fun casual pants with the right top!  They’re stretchy and my guess is the xxl would fit a curvy size 14 on up to a size 18 or maybe even 20.  If the company is looking for a plus size person to endorse on social media, I would totally do it!

The G Gradual Women’s Pants are fantastic for so many occasions—golf, lounging, traveling, or even casual workdays. The 7/8 length is super flattering, and the stretchy material ensures a comfortable fit without sacrificing style.  The deep pockets are a game-changer, easily holding essentials like a phone or keys. The lightweight fabric is breathable yet durable, making these pants ideal for any activity. They wash well and retain their shape and softness.  If you’re looking for versatile pants that combine function and style, these are a must-have. Highly recommend!

**Update 04/2024** I repurchased these in a size XL in the color OLIVE GREEN, just to see if I liked them better in a bigger size. I often prefer to size up now, as due to a surgery I had years ago, my lower tummy has gotten sensitive to things pressing on it. While these are definitely looser in the waist than the L, I think they unfortunately look a little sloppy. They're baggy in the crotch and just overall don't look like they fit as well. I may have not minded that in black, but in this slightly lighter shade, it's pretty obvious. I'm a bit in the fence about if I'll repurchase the large or not, we'll see.  I got these in the color BLACK in a size LARGE. For sizing reference, I'm usually a medium-large or a 8-12/29-31 in bottoms and jeans. If it helps, I wear a size 6 or 8 in Lulu leggings. I'm 5'3" tall with a short torso, and my measurements are about 44"-33"-44" (bust-waist-hip) right now, give or take.  I found these to be mostly TTS, though I'd recommend potentially sizing up if you have larger hips/butt. I still had plenty of room but would potentially size up to an XL if I wanted them baggier.  The material is super soft and stretchy, more brushed than athletic, though it has a hint of slickness to it. They are super comfortable.  The style is interesting, as it looks like it would be a jogger but it's cropped instead. I personally hate joggers, so I thought these were a nice change. I have thicker thighs and calves from years of soccer and these were super forgiving in those areas. I'm a little on the shorter side and found the length was a bit longer than I'd prefer, but I can just roll them up twice and they're perfect, or get them hemmed. In my picture, my left leg has the hem rolled and the right leg does not, so you can see the difference. They hit the top of my foot unrolled.  I really like these because they're good for running around, working out, or even for casual workwear. I do wish they didn't have the logo on the leg and instead had them either on the back of the waistband, and/or made it tonal so it wasn't obvious.  Overall, I'd definitely recommend these. I don't know if I'll grab any other colors, as I don't wear this type of thing often, but I still like them.

I really do like these pants a lot. They are incredibly soft, and I like the length of them. I am 5'3", and they fit just like the picture. I got these on sale for $25. I think they are a little overpriced. I also wish I had sized up. I am between a small and a medium, and I ordered the small. They fit, but I think I'd like the look better with a medium.

Super soft comfortable pants to go to therapy in, but cute enough to wear out! Although they say 7/8 length, these hit me at a normal shoe length. They are snug at the waist with elastic and a tie and loose all the way down. I was looking for an easy to wear after surgery, that wasn't sweatpants, so this works out! Purchased tie die and camouflage.

I am very pleased with these pants.  They are comfortable and the dark gray color is just as pictured.  I work in a warehouse, and I got these to wear in the summer.  They are way more light-weight than jeans, so they should less hot and constricting as jeans.  I will be ordering another pair in a different color.

评论概述: So great for what it is. LOVE IT!
评论详情: They are very comfortable. What I found amazing was how versatile they are. They can be used for lounging around the house, shopping, or going to the gym. It isn't the top of the line in quality but then again you aren't paying a top of the line price. I love them. I may buy another color.

I bought these to play golf in during the winter months, as well as to bring my kids on a walk or to the playground. I don’t love to wear leggings outside of the gym, so joggers are a great alternative for those types of activities. The material is a very thin performance material, which means they don’t provide much warmth, but I think this brand sells a fleece-lined version as well. I do like the fit. I’m 5’5” and 148lbs with a typical hourglass shape. Small waist, wider hips/bottom. The medium was a perfect fit for what I wanted. Be advised, if wanting to conceal anything you’ll want to size up!

I have had these pants in and out of my cart for months and months. I finally pulled the trigger and bought a pair after Christmas and boy do I wish I would have bought up all the colors! They are so soft and cozy! I am 5’1 so they hit me like regular pants, not so much the 7/8 length but that is just fine for me!
These are super cute and made really well but they are not capri length on me. They are actually full length. Maybe I have short legs????
I love these pants! I first found a pair on a TJ Max rack, loved them so much I looked the company up and ordered 3 more pairs! In my profession of my daily life, they work great! Highly recommend!
This product is true to size and the material would be great for packing. Not see thru and breathable material. Would purchase again!
These pants are really well made with deep pockets, amazing material and fit perfectly.  I ordered two more after discovering them.  I'm 5'2" and medium fits just right.

I absolutely love these pants. I read reviews and I thought they might be stiff or feel like rubber but NO! Kinda of creamy and incredibly comfortable. I ordered 4 more colors. Only thing that doesn’t make them perfect is they don’t offer longer legs or other styles or possibly blouses with the same material. They are a winner.

评论概述: Great for Yoga, Too Casual for the Office or Golf
评论详情: I like these pants—they’re nice and look great, just like in the photos. I had hoped they’d work for the office as athleisure, but they feel a bit too casual for that. I think it’s mainly due to the material and how they fit me. That said, they’re perfect for yoga and other casual activities.

评论概述: Super cute Joggers- Fit True to size
评论详情: Obsessed with these Joggers and I want them in every color. The only downside that I have is that they do start pilling pretty quickly. But I used my lint buster and it came right off!!! That is the only reason I'm leaving 4/5 stars. I am a true size medium. (6-8)

Love these pants! The material is super soft and they fit just right. I am about 5’9 and 155 (athletic build) and got a medium. The color is just as it appears online. I will definitely be ordering other colors.
Es un buen producto, pero en la información no se detalla que es ideal para clima frío.
As a 2XL these pants ran tight.

I'm short so these pants fit me nicely. It is a little anoying that the fabric makes a swishing noise when I walk. I have a hard time finding my size so I'm actually quite pleased with the fit. I love the color. I'm curiouse to know how they wash up.
I've been looking for pants to wear for pickleball on cold days, I absolutely love these, im short so length is perfect, im ordering more in different colors
I love this brand. It is different than Lululemon but just as great on. 1/3 the price!
I did not expect to like these pants so well. I love them!  Nicely made, so comfortable, love the pockets and the tapered legs. Quality is better than expected. Just ordered another pair.
These are very short. I am 5’2” and they were almost too short for me but I was ordered them for my daughter in law who’s 5’6” and they definitely would be too short for her.
I would say these are a little smaller than true size but not by much. They are a little shorter than I would like, closer to capris.

These pants are really comfortable. I normally wear a small, but purchased a medium based on reviews, a small would have definitely been too tight around the waist. I was hoping for a cropped jogger that would go above my ankle, but they go just below my ankle. The elastic in the waist seems to roll weird. Overall they are great for running errands or hanging out around the house. They are a decent jogger, but not sure if I will buy more.

Unfortunately these are not a true 7/8 leg if under 5'5. The material is nice and comfortable to touch. Not see through but also no very thick so they won't keep you warm. The size is true to size bit there is not much loose material. I would totally keep these but they are just too long. They go well past my ankle and over my shoes.
Very thick
Super comfy but look so much better than sweats. I ordered up a size but should have stuck with true size.
These pants are literal perfection. They are dupes of a more expensive brand who discontinued this style. So glad to have found them!
Love have many colors!
Could be a little shorter, I have long legs and they are long, I thought they would go above my ankles..
Great fabric and looks more expensive. I am washing it now for the first time. Hopefully, it will look the same.

As other reviewers stated, go up in size. I typically wear a size large or US10, 5’ 2 1/2” tall and bought the X-LARGE. They fit perfectly. Comfortable for every day use. Washed up nicely in cold water and steamed for 5 minutes.

These pants feel buttery soft!! I'm 5' 0" and I got the medium size. I only have to roll the pant leg up once to make it fit better, but these pants fit so comfortably! They don't feel cheap either like some of the other pants I've purchased on here.
So soft, comfortable and so stretchy!  Buying more colors. True to size

These pants are awesome!  I’m 5’4 and the XL is perfect length(surprise #1).  I bought the XL hoping they would be “roomy” but they are actually loose but not baggie. The fabric is silky smooth which was surprise (#2). The pockets are an extra bonus as most bulge out on me as I’m hippie but these pockets generally lay flat surprise #3). I’m 174 and glad I got the XL for a slightly loose fit.
Waist was tighter than expected.

I don’t ‘dislike’ anything about these pants!! They are soooo comfortable and it seems like they thought of everything! The little pocket, in a pocket, for your phone is great. I don’t have to carry a purse around with the basics in my pockets. They fit me perfectly although, I normally would wear a Large, the recommended size was XL, so that’s what I got. Just perfect. I want to get every color or these!!! I can see how they could work for every situation. Love.
Right length for me and material is lightweight and comfortable.

I really love these pants. The pockets on the sides are perfect. I love the length and how they are cropped. The only thing I can complain about is the band around the waste gets twisted up sometimes. But honestly I love them. Very stylish
Great material, soft and stretchy! Love the deep pockets. I wish they came in a full length version that were not joggers. I’m 5’8” and they are cropped, but not too short.
I’m 5’2 and weigh 138. The size large fits well. Extremely comfortable and stretchy

These pants were the perfect size for me. 5’2 119 lbs. light weight. A little stretch to them. I wore them as soon as I got them for golf because it was a little chilly. The material is light, but well made. I could wear my long underwear if needed under them. I could also use them for early morning pickelball in Florida. I can’t tell you how much I love them. Usually pants are too long. That’s were perfect!

评论概述: Comfortable and stylish for home or away
评论详情: Very comfortable. Pockets are perfect depth for a phone. They stretch and the fabric is soft and cozy. Not too warm. Not too thin.

I'm 5'3" and these are much longer on me than the model 😅 The material is nice but would be terrible if your haven't shaved your legs in a day or two. The pocket outline shows through the front. SIZE UP. I usually get a large, but got an XL based on reviews. Comfy. Would recommend.

These are awesome, i am 5'2 and hate for my joggers to bulk up around my ankle and these are shorter and hit me just right...only thing, is they do run a bit small...I am 5'2  122 and i got a M and if you want a more relaxed fit, size up...I literally could have worn a large if i wanted them to fit more loose...BUT, with that said, they fit fantastic and look really good!!!

This is the THIRD pair of this brand/style of pants I have purchased. They're comfortable, flattering, and the fabric is one of the nicest I've ever felt. They're no-fuss in terms of laundering/drying, and I can't say enough about them!

These pants are great for traveling and are very lightweight. I feel comfortable wearing them anywhere. The fit is perfect for me. I will probably buy some more. I bought a medium and they fit perfectly

I typically wear an extra small but ordered a small and an extra small since prior reviews were mixed.  I am keeping the small.  I am 5'4", 112 lbs and and the small fits best.  They hit above my ankles which is fine but I thought they might be longer based on other reviews.  The material is soft and feels a bit like PJ pants, very comfy.  I ordered black so the logo on the right thigh stood out too much which I didn't like.  I colored it with a black Sharpie and it turned grey, which is perfect.  I think this would work for the other colors as well.
Really comfortable and versatile

These are great for the gym, very well fitting and comfortable.  In fact, I bought a second pair. However, they are not warm sweatpants that you want to wear to walk the dog in winter. Just keep that in mind, gym only.

I have purchased these pants in 2 different colors now and will likely be buying more. They are super soft, stretchy, and comfortable. Perfect alternative to jeans or more dressy pants. They have become my go to travel pants. I am 5' 5" and they fit a little longer than in the photo but I like the length. Cute with sneakers or flip flops.

I love these pants! My office is business casual and I can wear these very comfy pants with blouses and flats for work, then throw on a sweatshirt and tennis shoes to go to my kids’ sporting events in the evening. I have several colors and wear almost daily! I’m 5’3 and wear 22w. 3x was perfect size and inseam for me
These are great pants I have them in 2 colors. I might buy another pair if they go on sale.
I golf everyday. I ended up buying 5 pairs of these they are so comfortable and cute!!!
Loved the fit and material but they were so wrinkled when I got them.  I had to steam them twice to get the wrinkles out.

I like the buttery soft material. Has just the right stretch. Advertised at 7/8th length and that is definitely not true. I am 5'7", 150lbs and ordered a large as recommended (usually wear a medium) and they are full length. Had same issue with  banded joggers. Will keep but wish they were true to description.

I loved everything about them. I bought a med as recommended. Yes, they fit but I wanted them a tad loser. My daughter typically wears a small but they fit her perfectly. I gave them to her but ordered 2 more in a large. That’s how much I liked them.

评论概述: Almost exactly what I'm looking for
评论详情: The material reminds me of a windbreaker, so it's a little bit swishy.  Love the deep front pockets, but wish they had back ones as well.  The shorter length makes them perfect for me at 5' to stop at my ankles. I'm thinking of buying a second pair in a different color.
Nice quality. Versatile.

评论用户: Susan Smith | The Social Blonde Files
评论概述: Add these to your cart & run to the checkout!
评论详情: There is a reason these are rated Amazon’s #1 best seller in golf pants even though I don’t golf!! Do not sleep on these! I love these pants so much I went back for five more colors. They are super comfortable, the fabric is soft and has the perfect amount of stretch while keeping their shape while wearing them. The five pockets are great for on the go, and the 7/8 ankle length hits perfectly to wear these year round. If you are tall like me, these hit right at the ankle and if you are on the short side, these will be the perfect full length pant. These are super versatile, can be dressed up or down and are now my new favorite pants! You can’t beat the price, especially when on sale and have held up better than any pants I’ve ever had from well known brands. If you are in between sizes, I would suggest sizing up.
Good quality and comfortable. I am 5’7.5” with an athletic build and the XL fit me perfectly! I have big thighs. The material is not see through.

These pants are so comfortable! The olive green color is exactly what I hoped for. The ankle length is perfect (I'm 5'3"). The material feels good on my skin and is just the right thickness. I washed them on a delicate cycle and hung them to dry - no issues. I plan to buy another pair!

Great fit. These just aren't quite what I was expecting. I thought these would be a more everyday material, but it's a stretchy, shiny material that I would probably only style with athletic wear. I'm just not sure that the cropped, open style matches the material. Even so, they're really comfy.

I struggle to find pants that are comfortable and fit my body type, but I liked these pants enough to buy two pairs. Amazon recommended an XL, but I sized up for a more relaxed fit. Also, because I’m only 5’2 so they are perfect as full-length pants. I ordered black camo and olive which was more of a olive-brown khaki. The fabric is silky soft and stretchy. Overall these will be great for outdoor activities and lounging around the house.
Had to exchange for smaller size.

评论概述: Great fit and comfortable with a small adjustment
评论详情: I bought two of these in two different colors and sizes and I love them both. Green is Medium size and black is Small size. For a reference, I'm 5.8 and 155 pounds. One thing I didn't like was the elastic waist (an enemy to apple shapes) it's super tight and constricting. However I ended up removing the inner elastic from the waist and now they fit perfect. They sit flat on my waist and the draw string allows for a natural waist adjustment. The waist may not be an issue for smaller waisted women, but for apple shapes the elastic waist may be a bit problematic in terms of creating a muffin top with the way it is. However if you're handy with the sewing machine, it's an easy and quick fix. Otherwise, I like the fabric, it's smooth, cool, it doesn't wrinkle, dries super fast, and no changes after multiple wears and washes. The side pockets are also great, they are functional and again create a nice hip line for someone with narrow hips. Definitely reccomend this one.
True to size. Color is nice. Not a fan of the waist band. The elastic tends to roll.
Nice product,  long for size
Lightweight easy to pack slacks.
These pants are so comfy and look nice enough to wear to work. Have bought more than one pair.
I love these joggers that I am buying a few more now! The comfort and fit is amazing!
Made well with soft material. Comfortable fit, just not for me.
The material is really nice for active pants. Would definitely buy in every color. I am 55 and wait 127. I got the medium and they are perfect.

I now have 2 pairs of these pants.  They are so butter soft, light weight and comfortable.  I work in a preschool classroom and am up and down from the ground many times. These pants are perfect.  The price is an added bonus!
Good fit and comfortable. Love that they have pockets and tie at the waist. Thought the fabric would be more soft than slick but it's not bad. Plan on wearing them.
Great fit and style.comfortable and washed well
I did, as many others did, ordered a larger size.  These are the most comfortable pants ever! They look great and stretch incredibly well.
Nice athletic fabric, order a size up

评论概述: Soft and comfy, just not right fit for me
评论详情: I purchased my normal size and then tried a size up and ended up returning both. The fit was perfect.....almost too perfect. I was hoping for a more loose fit, but I think it is just the material that clings a little more than what I was hoping for. My normal size would have been fine if that is what I was looking for. I sized up thinking they would be the fit I wanted, but there wasn't much difference. Overall, I could move well in them!
I’m really happy with the fit of this pant. Would buy again.

I got in the Camo Green which I really like. I am usually a 1x for pants, and the XXL fit just fine. The material is comfortable, and the deep pockets are great. I wish the length was an inch or so shorter as it hits just below my ankle, making the length a longer ankle pant, but it will work. The only thing…the pants arrived folded so tight and squeezed in in a very small opaque zip bag so anyone can see what’s in it. I laughed at the many many wrinkles that fortunately came out when washed and dried due to the material. I’m all for less waste but really…had to give 4 stars for that.
These are a little tighter than I thought they would be. I am a consistent medium. They unfortunately have a hole in the pocket too. But they are very soft and make your behind look good

I bought these for golf. They are comfortable like yoga pants but have a dressier look.  I am 5 feet tall and the length is just right for me. I only wish the white logo was not on the front pocket. It’s too visible.

评论概述: Breathable and light weight pants great for everyday.
评论详情: I would not call these sweatpants even though it is in the product description. They are great pants and I bought two different colors. I might also buy the Khaki if a review says that it is thick, which based on the ones I have, I think it would be.  I love the front deep pockets with the additional golf ball sized pocket on the right side. The material is nice and doesn't allow for much dog hair to cling to it (but I don't have a dog that sheds, but my SIL has a cream lab).  It washes and dries well. It also is a straight leg type pant with lots of thigh room with room to stretch. This pant can be a casual everyday pant, golf pant, or a lounging pant. The tie in the front doesn't make this a dressy pant unless you take it out and hide the pull on band at the waist.
Cute and comfy, not sure about the quality. Time will tell
I love them they are the best

I’m 5”0 so this pants isn’t 7/8 on me but a full size long pants and I love it! It’s the most comfortable pants I have and it is being used so very often this last summer and even now! It has a good stretch and lightweight. A good travel pants. I wore it for road trips, hiking, picnic by the beach, travelling, workouts, outings and even lounging at home! Will be buying more for when I’m traveling to visit family back in Singapore! This would just be perfect for the hot, humid and sweaty weather there!

I love the design and comfort of these pants. I have 2 dogs and this material does not attract dog fur. But I really would like them to be a bit longer, wish the company made them in the same material in a longer length.

评论概述: Not Navy, but definitely buttery soft
评论详情: These are not navy. The color is very purple whe paired with navy. The string is a good comparison too. Wish they fit and were right color. Love how soft they are!

Very nice pants, well fitting (runs slightly, slightly snug). I got light grey a d the color is entirely different than in the picture. It is more greenish grey, not the light silver gray pictured. Pants have nice, deep side pockets. I will keep them bit would have preferred color from the picture.
Good quality, nice color, forgiving material. Fit a bit snug in the waist. Would probably size up when ordering more.

I’m Pooh size and short.  I wanted some stretchy type pants instead of leggings.  I wear a size 16 jean and I’m only 4’11”.  The xxl short size fit perfect.  On me, they do go all the way to my shoe tops but that’s perfect for me.  They are super stretchy but very lightweight.  Super comfortable and great quality.
la calidad del pantalon es muy buena, el tamañan es exacto incluyo algo alto, tiene bolsillos secreto y son super livianos y comodos
